creator: ZIIP
descriptionHtml:
The ZIIP App is how you will connect to everything ZIIP has to offer. It was developed in-house using data from over 10 million treatments done since its launch in 2015, founder Melanie Simon's 20 years of professional expertise, and input from our very vocal ZIIP community of both novices and devotees.

A comprehensive menu of Full Facials and Targeted Treatments utilizing nanocurrent and microcurrent technology awaits you. Don't know where to start? Check out Treatment Plans.

The goal is to deliver personalized treatments completely tailored to your needs. Want Instant Gratification? We've got that. Best Skin of Your Life in 30 Days? We've got that, too."
descriptionShort: EXPERT FACIALS ON DEMAND - the world's most connected at-home skin care device

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Access to new Full Facials and Targeted Treatments, including ZIIP O.G. favorites and freeform options.
Longer-term Treatment Plans that offer multi-day and multi-week routines to deliver the most coordinated and meaningful improvements for your skin.
Easy-to-follow instructional videos by founder Melanie Simon accompany every treatment.
Each treatment is marked with duration and intensity level.
Improved video playback and overall functionality

title: ZIIP Beauty

creator: ZIIP
descriptionHtml:
The ZIIP Beauty App connects you to everything ZIIP has to offer, whether you are using the OX, GX or the latest ZIIP HALO device. It was developed in-house using feedback from over 10 million electrical facial treatments since ZIIP’s launch in 2015.

Together, with founder Melanie Simon's 20 years of professional expertise, and input from our community of ZIIP advocates - we bring you the ultimate collection of facials and treatments powered by ZIIP’s unique Dual Waveform Technology.

To complement the LIFT treatment that is pre-programmed on every ZIIP HALO, the ZIIP App offers a curated collection of full facials and targeted treatments, utilizing nanocurrent and microcurrent technology to give both immediate and lasting results.

Full Facial Treatments:
The Lift
Problem Solver
Electric Tone
Instant Gratification
Founder’s Favorite

Targeted Treatments:
Contour
Plump
Jowls
Brow Lift
Eyes
De-Puff

App Extras:
Learn Your HALO

Treatment Plans:
Best Skin of Your Life in 30 days
Event Prep
New to ZIIP

Melanie Simon walks you through each treatment with easy-to-follow videos. Receive the latest new treatments, exclusive offers and insider promotions through app notifications. With an extensive FAQ section, everything you need to achieve your best skin is in the palm of your hand.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Now includes support for Halo and GX devices.
